name: DigitalHealthDeepDiveIG
title: DigitalHealthDeepDiveIG
description: Digital Health Deep Dive Implementation Guide

resource.name: Connor Davidson Resilience Scale - 25 item
resource.description: This is a Questionnaire example of how the Connor Davidson Resilience Scale 25-item Questionnaire could be rendered as a FHIR Questionnaire Resource according to the Structured Data Capture SDC Base Questionnaire Profile. This example also portrays how FHIRpaths can be used to perform total score calculations using answer values.
